short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Chrome extension and service worker

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple Chrome extension and service worker that adds a message listener in background but does not have any popup to demonstrate the behaviour of chrome.runtime
This extension is for exploration and learning of chrome extension functionalities related to service workers lifetime, etc.
The extension does not require any additional permission
